page.title: 12My hobbies and Collections
page.content: My hobbies are playing snooker collecting little boxes and collecting soldiers. I play snooker with my brother because we have a snooker table. My highest break so far is 32. I am not sure what my brothers is, but it is quite high. Nan and Pop's when they come, pops, Richard and I play snooker tournament. I collect little boxes like match boxes and other small boxes. When ever we finish a match box I always get it and take it upstairs. When I've got a bit of time I always make something or put somethink in I've already got that is small. I like collecting soldiers because I like army. I have got about 350 soldiers which are about 5 cm in height and I've got some smaller soldiers about 1.5 cm high. I've got a castle, tanks, ships, lorries and jeeps. I collect army stuff as well. NICKI PEEBLES
